title: Bug 11786clipboard based copying of java resources  bad copy of package name
description: 1) Copy and paste 'junit.ui'.2) Observe: the resulting package is named 'ui'. It should be something like'copy.of.junit.ui' or 'junit.ui.copy.of'.Also compile errors are introduced as the CUs still expect the package nameto be 'junit.ui'.3) Paste again.There's a new folder (not package) called 'Copy of ui'.It should remain a package and have packagelike names.
